enWisdom: Greed is a sign of penury

Wisdom: الْحِرْصُ يَنْقُصُ قَدْرَ الرَّجُلِ وَلَا يَزِيدُ فِي رِزْقِهِ
enWisdom: Greed diminishes the status of a man and does not increase his sustenance
Greed is the cornerstone of poverty and the foundation of evil

Wisdom: الْحَرِيصُ فَقِيرٌ وَلَوْ مَلَكَ الدُّنْيَا بِحَذَافِيرِهَا
enWisdom: The one who is greedy is poor, even if he owns the whole world in its entirety

Wisdom: أَغْنَى الْأَغْنِيَاءِ مَنْ لَمْ يَكُنْ لِلْحِرْصِ أَسِيراً
enWisdom: The richest of the rich is one who is not a prisoner to greed
There is no adequacy for a greedy person
One who clothes himself with greed becomes poverty-stricken
